import Mathlib

noncomputable abbrev putnam_2022_a5_solution : ℕ := sorry
-- 290
/--
Alice and Bob play a game on a board consisting of one row of 2022 consecutive squares. They take turns placing tiles that cover two adjacent squares, with Alice going first. By rule, a tile must not cover a square that is already covered by another tile. The game ends when no tile can be placed according to this rule. Alice's goal is to maximize the number of uncovered squares when the game ends; Bob's goal is to minimize it. What is the greatest number of uncovered squares that Alice can ensure at the end of the game, no matter how Bob plays?
-/
theorem putnam_2022_a5
    (IsValidMove : Set (Fin 2022) → Set (Fin 2022) → Prop)
    (IsValidMove_def : ∀ x y, IsValidMove x y ↔
      (x = y ∧ ∀ i < 2021, i ∉ x → i + 1 ∈ x) ∨
      ∃ i < 2021, i ∉ x ∧ i + 1 ∉ x ∧ y = x ∪ {i, i + 1})
    (IsValidGame : List (Set (Fin 2022)) → Prop)
    (IsValidGame_def : ∀ g, IsValidGame g ↔ (∃ gt, g = ∅ :: gt) ∧ g.Chain' IsValidMove)
    (ConformsToStrategy : List (Set (Fin 2022)) → (Set (Fin 2022) → Set (Fin 2022)) → Prop)
    (ConformsToStrategy_def : ∀ g s, ConformsToStrategy g s ↔
      ∀ (i) (h : i + 1 < g.length), Even i → g[i + 1] = s g[i]) :
    IsGreatest
      {n | ∃ s, (∀ x, IsValidMove x (s x)) ∧ ∀ g,
        IsValidGame g → ConformsToStrategy g s → ∃ gh x, g = gh ++ [x] ∧ n ≤ xᶜ.ncard}
      putnam_2022_a5_solution :=

```lean4
theorem putnam_2022_a5
    (IsValidMove : Set (Fin 2022) → Set (Fin 2022) → Prop)
    (IsValidMove_def : ∀ x y, IsValidMove x y ↔
      (x = y ∧ ∀ i < 2021, i ∉ x → i + 1 ∈ x) ∨
      ∃ i < 2021, i ∉ x ∧ i + 1 ∉ x ∧ y = x ∪ {i, i + 1})
    (IsValidGame : List (Set (Fin 2022)) → Prop)
    (IsValidGame_def : ∀ g, IsValidGame g ↔ (∃ gt, g = ∅ :: gt) ∧ g.Chain' IsValidMove)
    (ConformsToStrategy : List (Set (Fin 2022)) → (Set (Fin 2022) → Set (Fin 2022)) → Prop)
    (ConformsToStrategy_def : ∀ g s, ConformsToStrategy g s ↔
      ∀ (i) (h : i + 1 < g.length), Even i → g[i + 1] = s g[i]) :
    IsGreatest
      {n | ∃ s, (∀ x, IsValidMove x (s x)) ∧ ∀ g,
        IsValidGame g → ConformsToStrategy g s → ∃ gh x, g = gh ++ [x] ∧ n ≤ xᶜ.ncard}
      putnam_2022_a5_solution := by
  have step₁ : IsGreatest {n | ∃ s, (∀ x, IsValidMove x (s x)) ∧ ∀ g, IsValidGame g → ConformsToStrategy g s → ∃ gh x, g = gh ++ [x] ∧ n ≤ xᶜ.ncard} putnam_2022_a5_solution := by
    have h₁ := IsValidMove_def ∅ ∅
    have h₂ := IsValidMove_def ∅ {1}
    have h₃ := IsValidMove_def {1} ∅
    have h₄ := IsValidMove_def {1} {1}
    have h₅ := IsValidMove_def {0} ∅
    have h₆ := IsValidMove_def ∅ {0}
    have h₇ := IsValidMove_def {0} {0}
    have h₈ := IsValidMove_def {0, 1} ∅
    have h₉ := IsValidMove_def ∅ {0, 1}
    have h₁₀ := IsValidMove_def {0, 1} {0, 1}
    have h₁₁ := IsValidMove_def {0, 1} {1, 2}
    have h₁₂ := IsValidMove_def {1, 2} ∅
    have h₁₃ := IsValidMove_def ∅ {1, 2}
    have h₁₄ := IsValidMove_def {1, 2} {1, 2}
    have h₁₅ := IsValidMove_def {1, 2} {0, 1, 2}
    have h₁₆ := IsValidMove_def {0, 1, 2} ∅
    have h₁₇ := IsValidMove_def ∅ {0, 1, 2}
    have h₁₈ := IsValidMove_def {0, 1, 2} {0, 1, 2}
    norm_num [IsValidMove_def, IsValidGame_def, ConformsToStrategy_def] at *
    <;>
    (try decide) <;>
    (try
      simp_all [Set.ext_iff, Finset.mem_singleton, Finset.mem_insert, Nat.even_iff]
      <;>
      aesop) <;>
    (try
      norm_num at *
      <;>
      aesop) <;>
    (try
      aesop)
    <;>
    aesop
  
  exact step₁
```

import Mathlib

noncomputable abbrev putnam_2022_a5_solution : ℕ := sorry
-- 290
/--
Alice and Bob play a game on a board consisting of one row of 2022 consecutive squares. They take turns placing tiles that cover two adjacent squares, with Alice going first. By rule, a tile must not cover a square that is already covered by another tile. The game ends when no tile can be placed according to this rule. Alice's goal is to maximize the number of uncovered squares when the game ends; Bob's goal is to minimize it. What is the greatest number of uncovered squares that Alice can ensure at the end of the game, no matter how Bob plays?
-/
theorem putnam_2022_a5
    (IsValidMove : Set (Fin 2022) → Set (Fin 2022) → Prop)
    (IsValidMove_def : ∀ x y, IsValidMove x y ↔
      (x = y ∧ ∀ i < 2021, i ∉ x → i + 1 ∈ x) ∨
      ∃ i < 2021, i ∉ x ∧ i + 1 ∉ x ∧ y = x ∪ {i, i + 1})
    (IsValidGame : List (Set (Fin 2022)) → Prop)
    (IsValidGame_def : ∀ g, IsValidGame g ↔ (∃ gt, g = ∅ :: gt) ∧ g.Chain' IsValidMove)
    (ConformsToStrategy : List (Set (Fin 2022)) → (Set (Fin 2022) → Set (Fin 2022)) → Prop)
    (ConformsToStrategy_def : ∀ g s, ConformsToStrategy g s ↔
      ∀ (i) (h : i + 1 < g.length), Even i → g[i + 1] = s g[i]) :
    IsGreatest
      {n | ∃ s, (∀ x, IsValidMove x (s x)) ∧ ∀ g,
        IsValidGame g → ConformsToStrategy g s → ∃ gh x, g = gh ++ [x] ∧ n ≤ xᶜ.ncard}

```lean4
    (IsValidMove : Set (Fin 2022) → Set (Fin 2022) → Prop)
    (IsValidMove_def : ∀ x y, IsValidMove x y ↔
      (x = y ∧ ∀ i < 2021, i ∉ x → i + 1 ∈ x) ∨
```

```lean4
    (IsValidGame : List (Set (Fin 2022)) → Prop)
    (IsValidGame_def : ∀ g, IsValidGame g ↔ (∃ gt, g = ∅ :: gt) ∧ g.Chain' IsValidMove)
    (ConformsToStrategy : List (Set (Fin 2022)) → (Set (Fin 2022) → Set (Fin 2022)) → Prop)
    (ConformsToStrategy_def : ∀ g s, ConformsToStrategy g s ↔
      ∀ (i) (h : i + 1 < g.length), Even i → g[i + 1] = s g[i]) :
    IsGreatest
      {n | ∃ s, (∀ x, IsValidMove x (s x)) ∧ ∀ g,
        IsValidGame g → ConformsToStrategy g s → ∃ gh x, g = gh ++ [x] ∧ n ≤ xᶜ.ncard}
      putnam_2022_a5_solution := by
  have step₁ : IsGreatest {n | ∃ s, (∀ x, IsValidMove x (s x)) ∧ ∀ g, IsValidGame g → ConformsToStrategy g s → ∃ gh x, g = gh ++ [x] ∧ n ≤ xᶜ.ncard} putnam_2022_a5_solution := by
    have h₁ := IsValidMove_def ∅ ∅
    have h₂ := IsValidMove_def ∅ {1}
    have h₃ := IsValidMove_def {0} ∅
    have h₄ := IsValidMove_def {0} {0}
    have h₅ := IsValidMove_def {0, 1} ∅
    have h₆ := IsValidMove_def {0, 1} {0, 1}
    have h₇ := IsValidMove_def {0, 1} {1, 2}
    have h₈ := IsValidMove_def {0, 1, 2} ∅
    have h₉ := IsValidMove_def {0, 1, 2} {0, 1, 2}
    have h₁₀ := IsValidMove_def {0, 1, 2} {1, 2, 3}
    have h₁₁ := IsValidMove_def {0, 1, 2, 3} ∅
    have h₁₂ := IsValidMove_def {0, 1, 2, 3} {0, 1, 2, 3}
    have h₁₃ := IsValidMove_def {0, 1, 2, 3} {1, 2, 3, 4}
    simp at h₁ h₂ h₃ h₄ h₅ h₆ h₇ h₈ h₉ h₁₀ h₁₁ h₁₂ h₁₃
    <;> norm_num [IsValidMove, Finset.ext_iff] at h₁ h₂ h₃ h₄ h₅ h₆ h₇ h₈ h₉ h₁₀ h₁₁ h₁₂ h₁₃ <;>
      (try decide) <;>
      (try {
        aesop
      }) <;>
      (try {
        simp_all [IsValidGame, ConformsToStrategy, List.Chain', List.cons, List.nil]
        <;>
        use ∅ <;>
        aesop
      }) <;>
      (try {
        use fun x => ∅
        <;>
        aesop
      }) <;>
      (try {
        use fun x => {0}
        <;>
        aesop
      }) <;>
      (try {
        use fun x => ∅
        <;>
        aesop
      }) <;>
      (try {
        use fun x => ∅
        <;>
        aesop
      })
    <;>
    aesop
  
  exact step₁
```
